text:
@DanPatrick No Plan Dan, 
Texas has 4 of the top 5 cities reporting positive Covid-19 cases in the US, those are the facts. The states pointed out to the Senate yesterday opened without following WH guidelines. You led the Texas effort, that is fact. 
Failed leader
#removeDanPatrick
